useCase.name: Version Assignment
useCase.description: Dataset Developer assigns a new version for the dataset in the Version Control Service

mainSequence.step: Dataset Developer accesses Version Control UI
Dataset Developer requests to Assign Version
Version Control UI requests Version Control Service to Assign Version
Version Control Service fetches Current Version Info from Version Metadata Store
Version Control Service increments the Version Number / Assigns New Version
Version Control Service successfully assigns the new version
Version Control Service informs Version Control UI about successful version assignment
Version Control UI displays a success message to the Dataset Developer
